short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View interactive Terraform Plans directly in your CI pipeline. Document your Code automatically and onboard new Engineers faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to interact visually with your Terraform code. It turns static infrastructure diagrams in your documentation or CI merge requests into a fully local and interactive Webui. 

This Terraform visualizer will help you with:
- Onboarding engineers
- Reviewing terraform plans
- Having up-to-date documentation

Try it out! 

Note: This extension works with diagrams generated by Inkdrop. Link to the repo: https://github.com/inkdrop-org/inkdrop-visualizer

Should you run into issues or want to give feedback, drop me a line or open an issue.
antoine@inkdrop.ai
